articles.title: Frank Thelens Tech-Aktien: Solarzellen, Recycling, 3-D-Druck
articles.description: Investor Frank Thelen startet einen Fonds aus kleinen Tech-Unternehmen aus der zweiten Reihe. Was er damit vorhat und warum er seinen Glauben an Tesla noch nicht verloren hat.
articles.content: Tesla, Palantir, Baidu wer in Tech-Aktien investiert, kommt an den  großen Namen schwer vorbei. Auch Frank Thelen, Start-up-Investor und TV-Star (Die Höhle der Löwen), hat privat und mit seinem 10XDN… [+5180 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive: To tap U.S. government billions, Tesla must unlock EV chargers
articles.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has often talked about opening his Supercharging network to competitors, but has never actually done so in the United States, where the company dominates the electric vehicle market.
articles.content: Feb 10 (Reuters) - Tesla CEO Elon Musk has often talked about opening his Supercharging network to competitors, but has never actually done so in the United States, where the company dominates the el… [+5194 chars]

articles.author: Hope King
articles.title: Vocal Tesla shareholder Ross Gerber plans board run
articles.description: The outspoken longtime Tesla shareholder, and prolific Twitter user, tells Axios that he will file a letter to Tesla's board next week stating his intentions to run for a seat.
